title: Key bindings don't work ingame. Deleting input.ini does nothing.
body:
I am having a persistent issue since the last patch wherein my keyboard does not work ingame. I can still chat fine, but all my key bindings do nothing. 

I have followed the suggestions and deleted input.ini and the relevant lines in PersistedSettings.json, but it does nothing and my bindings are still broken.

Any more suggestions other than the ones online?

replies.body: I wouldn't recommend deleting files as that could cause more issues.  Some keys are reserved for the game and unavailable to bind, and we have a[ keyboard and mouse ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#wq3)guide that provides more information on this.   Hit us up by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can help you to get this fixed up.  We'll respond asap!
Trying a full reinstall now. Will check once it's done and follow up then.
